title.narrative: TCE Ege Konteyner Terminal Isletmeleri A.S.

description.narrative: The Project is expected to deliver considerable development impact by (i) contributing to the growth of trade and economy in a region that is important for the Turkish economy by expanding container handling capacity immediately in the Aegean region; (ii) reducing the costs of transportation, thereby benefitting shippers, shipping lines and consumers and (iii) increasing competition in the market and encouraging other terminal operators in Turkey to improve the efficiency of their own terminal facilities, thereby spurring increased trade in the region.

The project involves the development and operation of a container terminal (the Terminal) at an existing port facility in Nemrut Bay, Izmir (the Project). The Project will be implemented by TCE Ege (the Company) based on a long-term lease agreement for the use of the stocking areas of the port facility owned by Ege Gubre as well as a priority right of use of its piers. The Terminal is expected to have 725 meters of berth, 2 mobile harbor cranes and two ship to shore gantry cranes, a 16.5 hectare container yard, and a total capacity of around 380,000 TEUs. The Company also has the right to increase capacity to 650,000 TEUs over time.

participating-org.narrative: TCE EGE KONTEYNER TERMINAL ISLETMELERI ANONIM SIRKETI

mailing-address.narrative: TCEEGE Konteyner Terminal Isletmeleri A.S. 25. Cadde No:2 Cakmakli 35801 Aliaga Izmir Turkey Telephone: 232-625-1344 Fax: 232-616-1284 Website: www.tceege.com

name.narrative: The Terminal is located in Nemrut Bay, Aliaga; 45 kilometers to the northwest of the city of Izmir in Turkey.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
